text: The men's 3 × 1000 metres relay event at the 1967 European Indoor Games was held on 12 March in Prague. It was the first time that this event was held at the championships. ==Results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text- align:center; font-size:95%" |- !Rank !Nation !Competitors !Time !Notes |- | ||align=left| ||align=left|Klaus Prenner Wolf-Jochen Schulte-Hillen Franz-Josef Kemper || 7:19.6 || |- | ||align=left| ||align=left|Pavel Hruška Pavel Pěnkava Petr Blaha || 7:20.0 || |- | ||align=left| ||align=left|Ramir Mitrofanov Stanislav Simbirtsev Mikhail Zhelobovskiy || 7:20.6 || |- | 4 ||align=left| ||align=left|Ivan Pavličević Radovan Piplović Jože Međimurec || 7:43.8 || |} ==References== Category:4 × 400 metres relay at the European Athletics Indoor Championships Relay
title: 1967 European Indoor Games – Men's 3 × 1000 metres relay
